ValidationRule.description: Custom Call Center Support Requests is required when Type of Service = Deliver or Install (Multi select)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( INCLUDES( Type_of_Services__c , "Delivery"), INCLUDES( Type_of_Services__c, "Install") ), ISBLANK( Custom_Call_Center_Support_Requests__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If Type of Service = Delivery or Install then Custom Call Center Support Requests is Required.
